articles.title: In National Book Awards finalist, Jewish trans boy and golem team up to save the world
articles.description: (JTA) — Jewish author Kyle Lukoff’s latest novel, “A World Worth Saving,” was named one of the finalists for this year’s National Book Awards in the Young People’s Literature category. The novel, which is aimed for middle-grade readers, features a young Jewish transgender boy who teams up with a golem, a creature from Jewish folklore,... The post In National Book Awards finalist, Jewish trans boy and golem team up to save the world appeared first on The Forward .
articles.author: Grace Gilson
